TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandLineBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 組成建構命令列的公用程式方法。

span.span: Comprises utility methods for constructing a command line.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。The following example creates a that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). ， ，和類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。The , , and classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task. summary.span: 將指定之 物件的檔名附加至命令列。

span.span: Appends the command line with the file name of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法中附加命令列使用工作項目規格，而且會括住以視需要加上引號的工作項目規格。This method appends the command line with a task item specification, and surrounds task item specification with quotations marks as necessary. 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格之前的工作項目規格。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the task item specification. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。The following example creates a that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). ， ，和類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。The , , and classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task. [!code-csharp[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/CS/ILAsm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/VB/ILAsm.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendFileNameIfNotNull (string fileName);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendFileNameIfNotNull(string fileName) cil managed
Public Sub AppendFileNameIfNotNull (fileName As String)
public: void AppendFileNameIfNotNull(System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要附加的檔案名稱。

span.span: The file name to append.

param.span: 如果為 ，則這個方法不會有任何作用。

span.span: If it is , then this method has no effect.

summary.span: 將以參數表示的檔案名稱附加至命令列，並視需要插入引號。

span.span: Appends the command line with file name represented by the parameter, inserting quotation marks if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會附加命令列與檔案名稱，並加上引號，視需要在檔案名稱周圍。This method appends the command line with a file name, and surrounds the file name with quotation marks as necessary. 如果第一個字元的檔案名稱是虛線，然後`.\`加入檔案名稱加以區別參數的開頭。If the first character of the file name is a dash, then `.\` is added to the beginning of the file name to distinguish it from a switch. 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格之前的檔案名稱。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file name. ## Examples `AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` 會產生`.\-StrangeFileName.cs`。`AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` yields `.\-StrangeFileName.cs`.

summary.span: 將檔名清單附加至命令列，並插入引號 (如果必要的話)。

span.span: Appends the command line with a list of file names, inserting quotation marks if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] fileItems, string delimiter);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] fileItems, string delimiter) cil managed
Public Sub AppendFileNamesIfNotNull (fileItems As ITaskItem(), delimiter As String)
public: void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ fileItems, System::String ^ delimiter);

param.name: fileItems
param.span: 要附加的工作項目規格。

span.span: The task item specifications to append.

param.span: 如果陣列為 ，則這個方法沒有作用。

span.span: If the array is , then this method has no effect.

param.name: delimiter
param.span: 要放在命令列中工作項目規格之間的分隔符號。

span.span: The delimiter to put between task item specifications in the command line.

summary.span: 將指定之 陣列中的檔名清單附加至命令列，並以指定的分隔符號 (Delimiter) 分隔。

span.span: Appends the command line with the list of file names in the specified array, separated by the specified delimiter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法和附加命令列與檔案名稱周圍加上引號，視需要的檔案名稱。This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary. 以指定的分隔符號分隔的檔案名稱。The file names are separated by the specified delimiter. 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，檔案名稱前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names. ## Examples 請參閱範例。See example in .

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull (string[] fileNames, string delimiter);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(string[] fileNames, string delimiter) cil managed
Public Sub AppendFileNamesIfNotNull (fileNames As String(), delimiter As String)
public: void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ fileNames, System::String ^ delimiter);

param.name: fileNames
param.span: 要附加的檔案名稱。

span.span: The file names to append.

param.span: 如果陣列為 ，則這個方法沒有作用。

span.span: If the array is , then this method has no effect.

param.name: delimiter
param.span: 命令列中的檔案名稱都有分隔符號隔開。

span.span: The delimiter to put between file names in the command line.

summary.span: 將指定之 陣列中的檔名清單附加至命令列，並以指定的分隔符號 (Delimiter) 分隔。

span.span: Appends the command line with the list of file names in the specified array, separated by the specified delimiter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法和附加命令列與檔案名稱周圍加上引號，視需要的檔案名稱。This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary. 以指定的分隔符號分隔的檔案名稱。The file names are separated by the specified delimiter. 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，檔案名稱前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names. ## Examples `AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` 會產生`Alpha.cs,Beta.cs`。`AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` yields `Alpha.cs,Beta.cs`.

summary.span: 將檔案名稱附加至命令列，並視需要在檔案名稱周圍加上引號。

span.span: Appends the command line with a file name, and surrounds the file name with quotation marks as necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果第一個字元的檔案名稱是虛線，然後`.\`加入檔案名稱加以區別參數的開頭。If the first character of the file name is a dash, then `.\` is added to the beginning of the file name to distinguish it from a switch. 這個方法不會將附加命令列，加上空格，再執行。This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing. ## Examples `AppendFileNameWithQuoting("-StrangeFileName.cs")` 會產生`.\-StrangeFileName.cs`。`AppendFileNameWithQuoting("-StrangeFileName.cs")` yields `.\-StrangeFileName.cs`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封裝加上引號，視需要個別的檔案名稱。This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary. 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` 會產生`/source:\"File Name.cs\"`。`AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` yields `/source:\"File Name.cs\"`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封裝加上引號，視需要個別的檔案名稱。This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary. 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` 會產生`/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"`。`AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` yields `/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"`.

summary.span: 將參數 (Switch) 附加至命令列，而不嘗試使用引號封裝選項參數 (Parameter)。

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch, without attempting to encapsulate the switch parameters with quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples 請參閱範例。See example in .

summary.span: 附加命令列與使用單一字串參數 (parameter) 的切換參數 (switch)，卻不嘗試以引號封裝切換參數 (switch parameter)。

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch that takes a single string parameter, without attempting to encapsulate the switch parameter with quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` 會產生`/source:File Name.cs`。`AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` yields `/source:File Name.cs`.

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of task item specifications that act as string parameters, without attempting to encapsulate them with quotation marks.

summary.span: 附加命令列與使用字串參數 (parameter) 陣列的切換參數 (switch)，卻不嘗試以引號封裝切換參數 (switch parameter)。

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of string parameters, without attempting to encapsulate switch parameters with quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` 會產生`/sources:Alpha.cs;Be ta.cs`。`AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` yields `/sources:Alpha.cs;Be ta.cs`.

Public Sub AppendTextUnquoted (textToAppend As String)

param.name: textToAppend
param.span: 要附加至命令列的字串。

span.span: The string to append to the command line.

summary.span: 附加命令列和字串，卻不嘗試以引號封裝字串。

span.span: Appends the command line with string, without attempting to encapsulate the string with quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會將附加命令列，加上空格，再執行。This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing. ## Examples `AppendTextUnquoted(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` 會產生`Folder name\\filename.cs`。`AppendTextUnquoted(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` yields `Folder name\\filename.cs`.

summary.span: 命令列附加字串，並視需要以引號括住字串。

span.span: Appends the command line with string, and surrounds the string with quotations marks as necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會將附加命令列，加上空格，再執行。This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing. ## Examples `AppendTextWithQuoting(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` 會產生`\"Folder name\\filename.cs\"`。`AppendTextWithQuoting(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` yields `\"Folder name\\filename.cs\"`.

Protected Overridable Sub VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes (switchName As String, parameter As String)
protected: virtual void VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes(System::String ^ switchName, System::String ^ parameter);

param.name: switchName
param.span: 字串，表示錯誤訊息的參數名稱。

span.span: A string representing the switch name for the error message.

param.name: parameter
param.span: 字串，表示要掃描雙引號的切換參數。

span.span: A string representing the switch parameter to scan for double-quotes.

summary.span: 如果命令列參數包含一個雙引號 (") 字元，則會傳回錯誤。

span.span: Returns an error if the command line parameter contains a double-quote (") character.

summary.span: 因為雙引號在命令列參數中不合法，所以此方法有助於避免參數插入式攻擊。

span.span: Because double quotes are illegal in command line parameters, this method helps prevent parameter injection attacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為虛擬方法，使您的應用程式可以覆寫這個方法，如果您想要允許雙引號逸出的檔案名稱。 is a virtual method so that your applications can override this method if you want to allow double-quotes escaped in filenames.
